title: Video: Blaenavon – I Will Be The World
body:
Five years ago, we introduced **Blaenavon** to the world, now they’re ready to take it over.

Having taken their time to piece together their debut LP, produced by the legendary Jim Abbiss, the trio are ready to cement their place as indie-rock gods. _I Will Be The World_, the first offering from the aforementioned debut record reminds me of when Wolf Alice returned with their heavier sound and more focused direction. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
